title: $945 - 2/1 Renovated Condo with Central AC and On-site Management
posting_body: Please contact us by text at
if you would like to schedule a tour or have any questions.
We have immediate move-in availability on a 2/1 856 ft² newly renovated condo with fresh paint, upgraded kitchen, and bath.

Thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, our floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities, an all-electric kitchen, refrigerator, pantry, tile flooring, ceiling fans, 2-inch mini blinds, central air conditioning, heating, washer and dryer connections, and more.
Easy access to 59 and 610, many local convenient stores nearby.
We bring you to comfort living at its best.
